name: Verify Interactive - Numerical Reasoning
description: Measures numerical reasoning ability through interactive problem-solving scenarios. Candidates analyze data, interpret charts and graphs, and solve numerical problems in a business context.

name: Verify Interactive - Verbal Reasoning
description: Assesses verbal reasoning skills through interactive scenarios. Candidates evaluate written arguments, draw logical conclusions, and interpret complex text passages.

name: Verify G+ Cognitive Ability
description: Comprehensive cognitive ability assessment measuring multiple dimensions including numerical, verbal, and logical reasoning. Provides a holistic view of a candidate's general mental ability.

name: Verify - Java
description: Assesses Java programming skills through coding challenges. Candidates solve real-world programming problems, demonstrating knowledge of Java syntax, object-oriented programming concepts, and problem-solving abilities.

name: Verify - Python
description: Evaluates Python programming proficiency through practical tasks. Candidates demonstrate knowledge of Python syntax, data structures, algorithms, and ability to write efficient code.

name: Verify - JavaScript
description: Tests JavaScript programming abilities with real-world problems. Candidates demonstrate knowledge of JavaScript syntax, DOM manipulation, asynchronous programming, and front-end development concepts.

name: Verify - SQL
description: Measures SQL query writing and database knowledge. Candidates demonstrate ability to write complex queries, join tables, aggregate data, and solve database problems efficiently.

name: Full Stack Developer Assessment
description: Comprehensive assessment for full stack developers covering front-end (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and back-end (Node.js, Python, or Java) technologies, along with database skills and API development.

name: Workplace Personality Inventory
description: Comprehensive personality assessment for workplace behaviors. Measures key traits related to work style, interpersonal approach, thinking style, and emotional resilience in professional contexts.

name: Occupational Personality Questionnaire
description: Detailed personality profile for workplace performance. Measures 32 dimensions across relationships with people, thinking style, feelings and emotions, and approach to work.

name: Situational Judgement Test
description: Evaluates decision-making in workplace scenarios. Candidates respond to realistic work situations, demonstrating judgment, problem-solving, and alignment with organizational values.

name: Teamwork Styles Assessment
description: Assesses collaboration styles and team effectiveness. Measures how individuals contribute to teams, resolve conflicts, communicate, and collaborate with others in workplace settings.

name: Leadership Assessment
description: Evaluates leadership potential and competencies. Measures strategic thinking, people management, change management, and other key leadership capabilities.

name: Analytical Reasoning Assessment
description: Measures analytical thinking and problem-solving abilities. Candidates analyze complex information, identify patterns, and draw logical conclusions from data.

name: Critical Thinking Test
description: Assesses ability to evaluate arguments, identify assumptions, and make sound judgments. Measures how candidates analyze information critically and solve complex problems.

name: Communication Skills Assessment
description: Evaluates written and verbal communication abilities. Measures clarity, persuasiveness, active listening, and ability to adapt communication style to different audiences.

name: Customer Service Aptitude
description: Assesses customer service orientation and skills. Measures empathy, problem-solving, patience, and ability to handle difficult customer interactions effectively.

name: Sales Potential Assessment
description: Evaluates sales aptitude and potential. Measures persuasiveness, resilience, goal orientation, and other traits associated with successful sales professionals.

name: Remote Work Readiness Assessment
description: Assesses ability to work effectively in remote environments. Measures self-discipline, communication skills, digital literacy, and ability to collaborate virtually.

name: Agile Mindset Assessment
description: Evaluates alignment with agile principles and practices. Measures adaptability, collaboration, continuous improvement mindset, and comfort with iterative work approaches.
